column1: ubue hore utlohe hloho ena uautlwa mampe
ke lahao le ha alenkile jwale
ngwana eo waka otseba tsomo basadi
empa keitse utlise jese le mose
ha esa uditenne ha uya moketeng
nkabe kedihlatswa tjee hona kajeno tjena
eya hle jwale wena ure keamenola
u ikwahetse ka kobo ka mahlong
ngwana enwa o moholo basadi yatsebang pentihos eo
ebe jwale motho oo oipapise le ng
u ausi wa likhapa eseng nna
e ke likhapa yareng ausi ho wena eseng nna
uatseba le nna le nna keabona hore watseba
mmannyeo ha kere kajeno ke labone
oo ngwana wa ntate mike wa ntate borait
ache mmannyeo ngwana enwa wahao utlamonka
ngwana eo orobaditswe kae na basadi
bona ekena ka mona ka vaskomong
jwale utlaapesa ngwana ka kobo emetsi
utlaapesa ngwana ka kobo e metsi
nna keautlwa kannete hore untsitisa mona moo kesebetsang teng
ke hore ha keqeta hotheoha betheng
ke tla u tlohela ulle sefapano
ska eala mona he pela makweba ana
tsamaya uye hoala mmete ona mane
e tsamaya uye hoala mmete hei
e tloo nka dintho tsena he uale kwana
nna wena keutlwa unkhathatsa matla kannete
ha eka ke hore uphethotse kannete tse
ngwana wahao ke wa mme wahae ke eng
wena yahao ena pina ke ejwang
ha esale umosiya hle ntate borait
feela kere ke eng na keetseba
ha uanka phenti mane ha mme machaka
ere ntate migaele aufe lamune ke eng
ha ware ntate migael aufe lamune
